LOHERA Name: Tottenham Park Cemetery- Address: Montagu Road- Type: Cemetery- Local Heritage Asset: The chapel is the focal point (and only landmark) of the cemetery, on the axis of the central main route through, and is also visible from Salmons Brook Walk, a local walking trail established by Enfield Council in [date?] It dates from the foundation o
TPO TPO Name: LBE ORDER NO (413) 2021

description: Works to 26 x Lime tree covered by LBE ORDER NO (413) 2021- Pollard all trees on the boulevard counting back previous point points, up to 4 meters in height and 3 meters in spread.
decision_conditions: The proposed works would have a negative impact upon the tree's long-term health and appearance. In the absence of sufficient supporting evidence to demonstrate the necessity of the work, the stated reasons for the work are considered unjustified and therefore unreasonable.

The Council does not consider that the grounds specified by the applicant/agent sufficient reason to justify the proposed heavy crown reduction of an avenue of mature and prominent trees of significant and collective amenity which make a positive contribution to the amenity of the locality and wider borough.
